Fancy Footwork.value: You may roll and extra die for Move each turn and choose which to use. If doubles are rolled on your Move dice, also recover 1 Fortune token

Side Bet.value: +1 Luck. When making any Skill test, if you roll 3 of a kind, recover 1 Fortune token. However if you roll three 1s, lose D3 Fortune tokens instead

High Roller.value: Your To-Hit rolls of 6+ do +1 Damage. Whenever you recover a Grit, you may also recover 1 Fortune token.

On a Roll.name: On a Roll
On a Roll.value: Whenever you kill an Enemy, you may recover 1 Fortune token. +1 Move

Well, I Say!.name: Well, I Say!
Well, I Say!.value: 1x per Adventure, you may recover Fortune tokens up to your max. +1 Lore

Play to Win.name: Play to Win
Play to Win.value: Your Poker Face ability now gives a bonus D6+2 x $50 instead, but also gives you and extra Unwanted Attention marker. +1 Fortune

Tell.name: Tell
Tell.value: For each To Hit roll of 1 an Enemy rolls when attacking you, you may cancel one of its other successful To Hit rolls on you. +1 Fortune

Box Cars.name: Box Cars
Box Cars.value: Any time you roll a 6 for Willpower, Defense, or any skill test, you may change any other single die of that test into a 6 as well. +1 Initiative

Affectation.name: Affectation
Affectation.value: At the start of each Adventure, you may draw a random Personal Item to use until the end of that Adventure

Cutthroat.name: Cutthroat
Cutthroat.value: You add +1 Shot and +1 Damage to any Light Gun you use. +1 Max Grit

Blow for Luck.name: Blow for Luck
Blow for Luck.value: 1x turn, you may spend 1 Grit to recover 1 Fortune or vice versa. +1 Fortune

Fancy Pants.name: Fancy Pants
Fancy Pants.value: You are +1 Sanity and +1 Health for each of the following Clothing items you have equipped: Hat, Belt, Coat, Pants, Torso, Gloves, Boots. You may not stay at the Camp Site in Town.

Make Your Own Luck.name: Make Your Own Luck
Make Your Own Luck.value: You start every Adventure with a Revive token, usable only by you. Gain 25 XP any time you use it. +1 Luck

Let It Ride.name: Let It Ride
Let It Ride.value: Any time you roll 4 or more dice together, you may choose any number of those dice to re-roll once. These dice do not count as having been re-rolled.

Entourage.name: Entourage
Entourage.value: You only need to pay 50% of the base 'Cost to Hire' for any Allies. All Items and tokens in Town cost you 20% less (rounding up to nearest $5). +1 Fortune

Aces High.name: Aces High
Aces High.value: If your Cunning is higher than an Enemy's Initiative, you are +1 on To-Hit rolls assigned to that Enemy (6+ is a Critical Hit)

Of Many Talents.value: At the start of each Adventure, choose one of the following keywords to have until the end of that Adventure: Traveler, Frontier, Outlaw, Soldier, Strange

Dark Stone Resistance.value: You can now hold 2 more Corruption Points before mutating

Spirit Hunter.value: +1 Initiative. When casting Battle spells, you may re-roll one of the casting dice. Extra Starting Gear: Dark Stone Hatchet, Warrior's Speed

Spirit Guardian.value: +1 Strength. When casting Spirit Magik Protection spells, you may re-roll one of the casting dice. Extra Starting Gear: Ancestral Shield

Spirit Shaper.value: +1 Max Grit. When casting Spirit Magik Shapeshifting spells, you may re-roll one of the casting dice. Extra Starting Gear: Bear Form

War Shaman.name: War Shaman
War Shaman.value: New Spirit Magik Battle or Protection spell

Harmony.name: Harmony
Harmony.value: You no longer need to roll for Corruption from Darkstone at the end of each Adventure. +1 Max Grit

Spirit Sacrifice.name: Spirit Sacrifice
Spirit Sacrifice.value: 1x turn when you kill an Enemy, you may use 2 Magik to recover a Grit. +1 Agility

Tribal Dance.name: Tribal Dance
Tribal Dance.value: While in Animal Form, you may re-roll 1 Defense or 1 To Hit roll per turn. +1 Initiative

Attuned.name: Attuned
Attuned.value: Dark Stone used to enhance your spells now add 3 extra casting dice each instead

Wisdom of Ages.name: Wisdom of Ages
Wisdom of Ages.value: New Spirit Magik Battle or Protection or Shapeshifting spell. +1 Cunning

Battle Chant.name: Battle Chant
Battle Chant.value: New Spirit Magik Battle or Protection spell. +1 Magik

Animal Nature.name: Animal Nature
Animal Nature.value: New Spirit Magik Shapeshifting spell. +1 Magik

Void Strength.name: Void Strength
Void Strength.value: You are +1 Health for each unique Item you carry that has a Dark Stone icon on it. +1 Strength

Ancestral Guide.name: Ancestral Guide
Ancestral Guide.value: 1x turn, you may use 2 Dark Stone to prevent the Darkness from moving on the Depth Track on a D6 roll of 3+

One With The Spirits.name: One With The Spirits
One With The Spirits.value: You may now cast other Spirit Magik, even while in Animal Form. +1 Combat

Light As A Feather.name: Light As A Feather
Light As A Feather.value: Items you carry that have a Dark Stone icon count as having 1 less weight. +1 Move

Tribal Elder.name: Tribal Elder
Tribal Elder.value: 1x turn, you may add an extra Power Level to a single spell you are casting

Ancient Rivals.value: You are +1 Damage on all Attacks against Void Enemies, and any time you collect XP from a Void Enemy, collect an extra +5 XP

Dark Stone Resistance.value: You can now hold 2 more Corruption Points before mutating

Ronin.value: +1 Max Fury and +1 Strength. When drawing Loot cards, you may draw one extra and choose one to discard. May not use Samurai Battle Tactics that have the keyword Healing. Extra Starting Gear: Samurai Armor, Ronin's Helmet

Quiet Traveler.value: Gain D3+1 Fury at the start of every Fight. Your 2-H Hand Weapons only take up 1-H for you to use

Sword Master.value: Rapid Strike (Blade) - Any time you kill an Enemy with a Combat Hit using a Blad Hand Weapon, you immediately gain +1 Combat for that Attack (limit +3)

Battle Yell.name: Battle Yell
Battle Yell.value: Any time you kill an Enemy with a Combat Hit, gain +1 Fury

Control Discipline.name: Control Discipline
Control Discipline.value: While using a 2-H blade, you may use the D8 for your Combat Damage. +1 Cunning

On the Road.name: On the Road
On the Road.value: You may start every Adventure with a free Fire Sake token. +1 Lore and +1 Move

Fighter's Training.name: Fighter's Training
Fighter's Training.value: New Wanderer Samurai Battle Tactic. +1 Max Grit.

Extra Effort.name: Extra Effort
Extra Effort.value: 1x turn you may spend 2 Fury each to add extra dice to any Skill test you are making. +1 Max Fury

Power Discipline.name: Power Discipline
Power Discipline.value: 1x turn while using a Blade, you may spend 5 Fury to add D6 Damage to one of your Combat Hits. +1 Strength

Calm Exterior.name: Calm Exterior
Calm Exterior.value: 1x turn, you may spend 2 Grit to gain Peril Die Fury. +1 Max Grit

Warrior's Resolve.name: Warrior's Resolve
Warrior's Resolve.value: New Wanderer Samurai Battle Tactic. +1 Combat

Unleashed.name: Unleashed
Unleashed.value: 1x Adventure, gain Fury up to your Max Fury for free. +1 Max Grit and +1 Max Fury

Mental Discipline.name: Mental Discipline
Mental Discipline.value: 1x Fight, at the start of a turn, you may reduce your Init by any amount (min 1). Gain Fury equal to this amount. +1 Spirit

Don't Make Him Angry.name: Don't Make Him Angry
Don't Make Him Angry.value: 1x Travel, you may spend 1 Grit to cancel a Travel Hazard (before any dice are rolled for it). +1 Combat

Master of War.name: Master of War
Master of War.value: At the start of each Adventure, draw a temporary Wanderer Samurai Battle Tactic. This is one use, only for this Adventure that may be played without spending Fury.

Master of Fury.name: Master of Fury
Master of Fury.value: Any time you spend Fury, add 1 extra Fury to the total spent for free. +1 Initiative

Flashing Steel.name: Flashing Steel
Flashing Steel.value: While you have a Blade equipped, you are +1 Damage on your Combat Hits, and 1x turn you may re-roll all of your failed Defense rolls just rolled

Honorable Vendetta.value: Choose an Enemy keyword. Any time you collect XP from those Enemies, collect an extra +10 XP

Dark Stone Resistance.value: You can now hold 2 more Corruption Points before mutating

Call Your Shot.value: Before rolling To Hit, choose a number. Any die that rolls the chosen number does an extra 1 Damage ignoring Defense even if the shot would normally miss.

Card Shark.value: +1 Cunning and +1 Luck. Any time you win at Gambling in Town, you gain an extra D6 x $10.

1455a125-99a3-4aeb-bd6c-0d66bce4b87c.Catch Phrase: Once per Adventure, you may say your Catch Phrase to immediately Heal 2D6 Wounds or to add D6 Damage to one of your Hits.

Cerberus Shots.value: Start with up to 2 Cerberus Shots in your Six-Shooter. (Blue markers)

Charmed Life.value: You start every Adventure with a Revive Token, usable only by you. Gain 25 XP any time you use it. +1 Lore.

Cool Hand.value: At the start of any Fight Turn, you may reduce your Initiative by 3 to gain +1 Shot with a 1-Handed Gun. +1 Max Grit.

Dark Stone Resistance.value: You can now hold 2 more Corruption Points before gaining a Mutation.

Hellfire Shots.value: Start with up to 2 Hellfire Shots in your Six-Shooter. (Red markers)

1455a125-99a3-4aeb-bd6c-0d66bce4b87c.Hushed Whispers: You now start every Adventure and Town Stay with an extra 1 Grit.

Killer.value: You may now use up to 2 Shots from your Six-Shooter on each Hit. +1 Max Grit.

Legend of the West.value: Once per Fight, use 2 Grit to add extra Damage to one of your Hits, equal to your current Hero Level.

Master of Killin'.value: You may now use your Six-Shooter Shots with any Gun, not just Pistols. +1 Max Grit.

1455a125-99a3-4aeb-bd6c-0d66bce4b87c.Pistol Fanning: Use 1 Grit to double the number of Shots you get with a 1-Handed Gun for one Attack (limit once per turn). To use this ability, you must have 1 Hand slot open.
1455a125-99a3-4aeb-bd6c-0d66bce4b87c.Quick and the Dead: Uses the Six Shooter template. Starts each game fully loaded with 6 Dead Eye Shot bullets
1455a125-99a3-4aeb-bd6c-0d66bce4b87c.Quickdraw: Anytime a new group of Enemies is placed on the board, you may immediately make a free Attack outside of the normal turn sequence.  To use the ability, you must have 1 Hand slot open.
1455a125-99a3-4aeb-bd6c-0d66bce4b87c.Reload: Use 2 Grit to re-fill D6 Shots back into your Six Shooter Template
1455a125-99a3-4aeb-bd6c-0d66bce4b87c.Ricochet Shots: Start with up to 2 Ricochet Shots in your Six Shooter. (Green markers)

Side Bag Capacity.value: +1 Side Bag Token Capacity. Also gain +D6 Sanity.

The Right Tool.value: You may start each Adventure with any mix of Shot Types in your Six-Shooter Template. +1 Max Grit.

Through Shot.value: Any time you kill and Enemy with a 1-Handed Gun, you may immediately do a free Hit with that Gun to another Enemy in one of the three spaces behind it.

Vendetta.value: Choose an Enemy Type. From now on, any time you collect XP from those Enemies, collect an extra +10 XP

Brash Heroics.value: Once per Fight, use 1 Grit to do D6 Wounds, ignoring Defense to both yourself and one adjacent Enemy. +3 Health.

Close Companion.value: While you have a Trasnport Animal (it must be named), you are: Willpower 3+.

Daredevil.value: You are +2 Move.  All of your Attacks on adjacent Large size or bigger Enemies are +1 Damage

Dark Stone Resistance.value: You can now hold 2 more Corruption Points before gaining a Mutation.

Fancy Roping.value: Any time you Rope an Enemy with the Lasso, gain 10 XP, and Recover a Grit on the D6 roll of 4+. +1 Initiative.

Fast Return.value: You may now use the Lasso up to twice per Fight, but only one Enemy may be Roped at a time. +1 Agility.

Frontier Rivals.value: You are now +1 Damage on all Attacks vs Tribal, Outlaw, or Beast Enemies, and gain +25 XP for each you kill. +1 Max Grit.

Frontier Vendetta.value: Choose an Enemy Keyword. From now on, any time you collect XP from those Enemies, collect an extra +10 XP

Giddy-Up!.value: Once per Fight, use 1 Grit to Mount an adjacent, Large or bigger Enemy (sharing its full base). While Mounted, you may not be targeted by that Enemy and the Enemy is -1 Defense. At the end of each turn, pass a Strength 6+ test (gaining 25 XP) or dismount to an adjacent empty space.

2e2e4022-35c0-498c-ad78-8b87f5664026.Happy Trails: Once per Travel, may spend 1 Grit to cancel a Travel Hazard on the D6 roll of 3+ (before any tests are made for that Travel Hazard).
2e2e4022-35c0-498c-ad78-8b87f5664026.Living Off the Land: You gain double XP from Scavenge cards and may roll one extra die when Scavenging. Alos, for each Scavenge card drawn, Heal 1 Wound or Sanity.
2e2e4022-35c0-498c-ad78-8b87f5664026.Living on the Edge: While you are at half or less of either your Health or Sanity, your Rough Rider ability triggers on a 3+ instead (or 2+ if both).

Pale Rider.value: You may now use your Rought Rider ability to Recover Grit as long as you only have 0 or 1 Grit at the start of the turn, and it may be used even while KO'd.

2e2e4022-35c0-498c-ad78-8b87f5664026.Rough Rider: At the start of each Turn (or Day in Town), if you have no Grit, Recover 1 Grit on the D6 roll of 4+.

Shake It Off.value: At the end of any turn while KO'd, use 2 Grit to Recover without rolling for Injury/Madness. Heal 2D6 (any mix) as normal. +1 Strength.

Side Bag Capacity.value: +2 Side Bag Token Capacity. Also gain +D6 Health

Sucker Punch.value: Once per turn, use 1 Grit to use your Strength value (instead of rolling) as Damage for a Combat Hit. +1 Max Grit.

2e2e4022-35c0-498c-ad78-8b87f5664026.Take a Swing: Once per turn, use 1 Grit to make a Melee Attack using your Basic Combat (no Items), in addition to your normal Ranged Attack.
2e2e4022-35c0-498c-ad78-8b87f5664026.Trick Shooting: Use 1 Grit when you cause a Hit with a Gun to immediately cause an additional D3 other Enemies in a continuous chain, starting adjacent to the target, to also take a single Hit from that Gun
2e2e4022-35c0-498c-ad78-8b87f5664026.Watchman: You always Activate before Enemies at your Initiative level.  Also all Heroes in your Posse gain +2 Initiative during the first turn of an Ambush Attack. Extra Starting Gear: Rider's Rifle (replaces Pistol)

Who Wants to Live Forever?.value: You gain +2 Shots with a 1-Handed Gun or +2 Combat (you choose), during you rActivation for every Horror Hit you took form Fear, Terror, or Unspeakable Terror this turn (max +3).

Wilderness Mastered.value: While you have 4 or more Clothing Items Equipped (including a Hat), you are: Defense 3+

Bad Ass.value: Once per turn, use 2 Grit to make an extra Attack. +1 Initiative

30d35552-bd40-444d-9558-df917fbc4398.Bitter Enemies: Choose one (Undead, Demon, Mutant, or Beast). Your Hits are now +2 Damage vs those Enemies and when gaining XP from them, gain an extra 10 XP.
30d35552-bd40-444d-9558-df917fbc4398.Danger Magnet: All Enemies gain 1 Elite ability for free. When traveling to town, always add an extra D3 Traveling Hazards

Dark Stone Resistance.value: You can now hold 2 more Corruption Points before gaining a Mutation.

30d35552-bd40-444d-9558-df917fbc4398.Distrustful: -1 Initiative for every Hero adjacent at the start of the turn (min 1)
30d35552-bd40-444d-9558-df917fbc4398.Drifter's Secret: Immortal - At the start of every Adventure, roll 2D6 for each Injury, Curse, Parasite, or Mutation the Hero has. On the roll of 7 or higher, it is healed.  Any time the Hero would be killed, they are considered dead for the rest of the Adventure/Town Stay. At the start of the next Adventure, the Hero is automatically returned to life, but must roll once on the Madness Chart and starts with no Grit.

Feared by Evil.value: At the start of each turn during a Fight, choose an Enemy on your Map Tile. It immediately takes D3 Wounds.

Grizzled by Time.value: At the end of every successful Mission, roll a D6. On the roll of 5+, you gain +1 Health.

30d35552-bd40-444d-9558-df917fbc4398.Gunslinger: For ever 6+ you roll To Hit with a Pistol Ranged Attack, you gain +1 Shot with that Gun (max +3 Shots per turn)

Infamous.value: All XP you gain while Traveling, in Town, or from Mission Rewards, is doubled. +1 Initiative.

30d35552-bd40-444d-9558-df917fbc4398.Jaded: You gain the Keyword Outlaw and may roll an extra die for movement each turn, and choose which to use. +2 Max Grit.
30d35552-bd40-444d-9558-df917fbc4398.Long Years Experience: Not restricted to targeting adjacent Enemies first with Ranged Attacks. Starts with 2 Personal Items. At start of each Fight, every other non-Drifter Hero may Recover 1 Grit.

Loose Cannon.value: Once per turn, use 1 Grit to add Damage to one of your Hits equal to your current Sanity Damage (max +5). +1 Max Grit.

No Name.value: The Hero has no name. Instead, the rest of the posse may decide on a nickname for the Hero. +1 Agility. Start every Adventure with Max Grit.

30d35552-bd40-444d-9558-df917fbc4398.Resourceful: Any time you draw one or more Loot, Scavenge, Darkness, or Encounter cards, you may draw one extra card, then choose one of those to discard. If used for an Encounter draw, the Hero must be on the Map Tile that the Encounter is drawn for.

Restraint.value: At the start of every Fight, you may Heal 3 Wounds / Sanity (any mix) from each other Hero. +1 Max Grit.

Sage Advice.value: Each other Hero that Activates before you during the turn may Re-roll one of their dice just rolled, of your choice. +1 Agility.

Side Bag Capacity.value: +2 Side Bag Token Capacity. Also gain +2 Sanity.

Sneer.value: You are Immune to Horror Hits caused by Enemies. +1 Max Grit.

Spinning Guns.value: Use 2 Grit to immediately do D6 Wounds to every adjacent Enemy, ignoring Defense.

30d35552-bd40-444d-9558-df917fbc4398.Squint: While there are no other Heroes adjacent to you, you are Defense 3+

True Hero.value: Once per Fight, use 3 Grit to immediately Recover a KO'd Hero on your Map Tile. +2 Max Grit.

Unimpressed.value: Any time a Growing Dread card is drawn, roll a D6. On the roll of 4+, cancel it. +1 Max Grit.

Weapon of Choice.value: Choose one (Hand Weapon, Pistol, Shotgun, or Rifle). You now add +1 Combat/ +1 Shot to any Weapon you are using with that Keyword.

Agility.value: +1 Agility. Also gain D6 Health/Sanity (any mix).

Dark Stone Resistance.value: You can now hold 2 more Corruption Points before gaining a Mutation.

Dark Stone Trap.value: Use 2 Grit to drop a Dark Stone in an adjacent space during your Move. As an Attack, detonate it doing 2D6 Damage to all models in the same and adjacent spaces.

Deadly Shot.value: Your Critical Hits with a Gun are +3 Damage

3ec81ec0-56da-4e53-b9b6-cb71af815dbf.Dressed for Adventure: You gain +2 Health for each Clothing Item you wear. Clothing Items do not count weight against your Carrying limit.
3ec81ec0-56da-4e53-b9b6-cb71af815dbf.Evasion: You may roll 2 dice for Escape tests and pick the highest roll.
3ec81ec0-56da-4e53-b9b6-cb71af815dbf.Farmstead Defender: If there are no Enemies adjacent to you, you may Re-roll one missed To Hit roll per turn.

Fisticuffs.value: Once per Fight, you may add +1 Damage to all your Combat Hits.

Forge Works.value: While at the Blacksmith in Town, you may pay $500 less for any Upgrades purchased at the Dark Stone Forge. +1 Strength.

3ec81ec0-56da-4e53-b9b6-cb71af815dbf.Home Remedies: Use 1 Grit to Heal D6 Wounds from yourself or another adjacent Hero (gain 5 XP for every Wound healed from another Hero this way).

I've Seen Worse!.value: Use 2 Grit whie KO'd to Heal D6+2 Wounds/Sanity (any mix) and place your model back on the board.

3ec81ec0-56da-4e53-b9b6-cb71af815dbf.Iron Concentration: Once per turn, you may Re-roll a single damage roll for one of your Gun Hits.

Life Goes On.value: You are now +1 Initiative for each Mutation you have (max +3). +1 Max Grit.

Rapid Reload.value: You get +1 Shot with any 2-Handed Gun.

3ec81ec0-56da-4e53-b9b6-cb71af815dbf.Rapid Shot: 2-Handed. Anytime you kill an Enemy with a 2-Handed Gun, you immediately gain +1 Shot with that Gun.
3ec81ec0-56da-4e53-b9b6-cb71af815dbf.Ready for Action: You may now carry twice as many Tokens in your Side Bag

Refinement.value: You may use 12 Dark Stone to fill an Upgrade Slot on a Gun or Hand Weapon. That Item is now +1 Damage and has 1 Dark Stone.

Sharpshooter.value: Any time you kill an Enemy with a Gun, you may immediately do D6 Damage to anoter Enemy in one of the three spaces behind it.

Strength.value: +1 Strength. Also gain D6 Health/Sanity (any mix).

3ec81ec0-56da-4e53-b9b6-cb71af815dbf.Swinging Rifle: Use 1 Grit during your Activation to do 1 automatic Combat Hit to every adjacent Enemy. This does not count as your Attack. Use only while equipped with a 2-Handed Gun.

Vendetta.value: Choose an Enemy Type. From now on, any time you collect XP from those Enemies, collect an extra +10 XP

Void Enhancement.value: Once per turn, you may use a Dark Stone to add +D6 Damage to one of your Hits. +1 Max Grit.

A Story to Tell.value: You gain extra Movement each turn equal to your Lore. +1 Lore.

Above the Law.value: Use 2 Grit to ready your Marshal Badge. Limit once per Adventure. +1 Max Grit.

Agility.value: +1 Agility. Also gain D6 Health/Sanity (any mix).

Back Up Plan.value: You may now Recover a Grit on a Move roll of 6 as well as the normal 1.

Been Around.value: Any time you would take 1 or more Sanity Damage, take 1 fewer. +1 Lore.

45b3ac67-15f6-4654-bba1-3c73493aa821.Cleaning up the West: Any time you kill an Enemy, you may Heal 1 Wound and 1 Sanity and gain 10 XP.

Cunning.value: +1 Cunning. Also gain D6 Health/Sanity (any mix).

Dark Stone Resistance.value: You can hold 2 more Corruption Points before gaining a Mutation.

Dead or Alive.value: Use 2 Grit to cancel a Darkness or Growing Dread card. +1 Max Grit.

45b3ac67-15f6-4654-bba1-3c73493aa821.Double Shot: (Shotgun) Once per turn, when you kill an Enemy with a Shotgun, you gain +1 Shot with that Shotgun

End of the Line.value: Once per turn, use 3 Grit to do one automatic Hit to every Enemy on y our Map Tile. These Hits use the D8 for Damage.

Focus.value: You no longer need to target adjacent Enemies first with Ranged Attacks. +1 Max Grit.

45b3ac67-15f6-4654-bba1-3c73493aa821.Hardened Resolve: Use 1 Grit to Heal 3 Wounds or 3 Sanity from yourself or another Hero on you Map Tile (gain 5 XP for ever Wound/Sanity healed from another Hero this way). You are +2 Sanity.

Hunter.value: At the start of each Adventure, choose a specific Enemy Type. You are +1 Damage against that Enemy and gain $10 for each you kill.

I Don't Think So!.value: Once per turn, you may take 1 Corruption Hit to force an Enemy on your Map Tile to Re-roll a single die just rolled

45b3ac67-15f6-4654-bba1-3c73493aa821.Look Out!: Use 1 Grit to transfer all Hits just taken by an adjacent Hero to yourself (before Defense rolls). Gain 10 XP for each Hit transferred.

Lore.value: +1 Lore. Also gain D6 Health/Sanity (any mix).

Luck.value: +1 Luck. Also gain D6 Health/Sanity (any mix).

No Nonsense.value: Add +1 Shot to any Shotgun you are using. Rolling the same Mutation twice on the chart has no effect on you.

No Shame In It.value: Once per turn, you may take 1 Corruption Hit to use a Dark Stone in place of a Grit. +1 Strength.

One Man Army.value: While you are the only Hero on your Map Tile, you gain +1 Combat or +1 Shot with a Gun. +1 Max Grit.

45b3ac67-15f6-4654-bba1-3c73493aa821.Rolling Thunder: Anytime you kill an Enemy, you may Recover a Grit on the D6 roll of 4, 5, or 6.

Saddle Bags.value: You may now carry an extra 3 Tokens in your Side Bag.

Side Bag Capacity.value: +1 Side Bag Token Capacity. Also gain +D6 Health/Sanity (any mix)

Spirit.value: +1 Spirit. Also gain D6 Health/Sanity (any mix).

Strength.value: +1 Strength. Also gain D6 Health/Sanity (any mix).

That Does It!.value: Your Hits are +1 Damage for each Mutation you have (max +3). +1 Strength.

Vendetta.value: Choose a specific Enemy Type. From now on, any time you collect XP from that Enemy Type, collect an addition +10 XP.

Whirling Strike.value: Use 2 Grit as an Attack to roll your full Combat against every adjacent Enemy.

Agility.value: +1 Agility. Also gain D6 Health/Sanity (any mix).

Ancestor's Favor.value: Whenever you kill a Large or bigger Enemy, you may move the Darkness back one space on the Depth Track (does not trigger special spaces moved back through). +1 Spirit.

Battle Stance.value: Whenever one or more Enemy groups are placed in Ambush, Recover 1 Grit. +1 Strength.

Dark Stone Resistance.value: You can now hold 2 more Corruption Points before gaining a Mutation.

Deep Cuts.value: You may double the Endurance value of any Enemy while Attacking it. +1 Strength.

48bdac8c-01a4-4284-ba73-775a79dda210.Enemy Tracks: Once per Adventure, use 1 Grit to switch Attack (or Ambush) on an Exploration Token into 2x Encounters instead. The rest of the Token remains the same.

Fighting Style.value: Choose a specific Enemy Type. From now on you take 1 less Damage from any Attack made by an Enemy of that Type (minimum 1).

Fungus Grower.value: You gain 1 Swamp Fungus Side Bag Token at the start of each Adventure.

Fury of Jargono.value: Once per Fight, use 2 Grit to make an extra Attack this Activation. +2 Max Grit.

48bdac8c-01a4-4284-ba73-775a79dda210.Hunter's Reflexes: You are +1 Damage on all of your Attacks against Beast Enemies. Also, gain +2 Initiative in the first turn of an Ambush Attack
48bdac8c-01a4-4284-ba73-775a79dda210.Jumping Attack: Once per Fight, you may spend un-used movement points from your Move to add Damge to one of your Combat Hits. Ever 2 Move = +1 Damage.

Lore (Health or Sanity).value: +1 Lore. Also gain D6 Health/Sanity (any mix).

Master of the Hunt.value: You gain +2 Combat and +2 Shots with any Bow you are using, while there are one or more Extra Large (or bigger) Enemies on the board.

48bdac8c-01a4-4284-ba73-775a79dda210.Other World Native (Jargono): Starts with a Swamps of Jargono Personal Item instead of a normal Personal Item. Also, +3 Lore while in Swamps of Jargono.
48bdac8c-01a4-4284-ba73-775a79dda210.Pit Fighter: If you start your Activation adjacent to one or more Enemies, Recover a Grit on the D6 roll of 5+. Also, once per turn, while you have a Shield equipped, you may force one Enemy Hit just rolled against you to be Re-rolled.
48bdac8c-01a4-4284-ba73-775a79dda210.Primitive: You may not use Guns, Books, or Tech items

Quick Shot.value: You may add +1 Shot to any Bow you are using. +1 Initiative and +1 Agility.

Serpent Slayer.value: You are +1 Move and may move through other models. You are also immune to Poison markers. Extra Starting Gear: Dark Stone Daggers (replaces Tribal Shield and Dark Stone Blade)

Shield Bash.value: While you have a Shield equipped, you are +1 Combat. +1 Max Grit.

Shield Charge.value: Use 1 Grit, while you have  Shield equipped, to move through other models this turn. Each model moved through takes 2 Wounds, ignoring Defense (limit once per model).

Side Bag Capacity.value: +2 Side Bag Token Capacity. Also gain +D6 Sanity (any mix).

Spinning Slash.value: While you have a 2-Handed Item Hand Weapon equipped, you are +1 Damage with Combat Hits. +1 Initiative.

Stealth Strike.value: Your Critical Hits are +1 Damage and you are +1 to all Escape rolls. +1 Agility.

Treetop Hunter.value: Ranged To Hit: 4+.  Double-shot (Bow) - Once per turn, when you kill an enemy with a Bow, you gain +1 Shot with that Bow. Extra Starting Gear: Jargono Bow (replaces Tribal Shield)

Tribal Warrior.value: You are +2 Health for each Tribal Item you have (max +10). +1 Strength.

Agility.value: +1 Agility. Also gain 2 Health and +2 Sanity.

651350a6-d930-4372-9bce-1d200149362a.Battle Scout: Once per Adventure, give all other Heroes +2 Initiative unti the end of the turn. You may Recover 1 Grit.
651350a6-d930-4372-9bce-1d200149362a.Cavalry Scout: You may roll 2 dice for Move each turn and choose which to use.

Cleansing Ritual.value: Use 2 Grit to remove a Corruption Point from yourself or an adjacent Hero. +1 Max Grit.

Counting Trophies.value: Once per Adventure, you may Heal Sanity Damage equal to the number of Enemies you have killed during this Mission. This may be Healed from any mix of Heroes.

Cunning.value: +1 Cunning. Also gain +2 Health and +2 Sanity.

Dark Stone Resistance.value: You can now hold 2 more Corruption Points before gaining a Mutation.

Duck and Roll.value: Use 2 Grit to ignore all damage just done to you by a single source. +1 Max Grit.

Eye for Detail.value: When you successfully Scavenge, you may draw one extra card, then choose one to discard. +1 Cunning.

Guardian Spirit.value: Once per Adventure, you may cancel a Growing Dread or Darkness card on the D6 roll of 3+.

651350a6-d930-4372-9bce-1d200149362a.Heightened Senses: Once per turn you may Re-roll a single To Hit roll or Defense roll.

I Smell Death Here!.value: Once per turn, use 1 Grit to discard and re-draw a Threat card just drawn. Gain 25 XP.

Know Your Prey.value: Once per turn, you may Re-roll a Damage roll for one of your Hits.

Lore.value: +1 Lore. Also gain +2 Health and +2 Sanity.

Luck.value: +1 Luck. Also gain +2 Health and +2 Sanity.

Moves in the Shadows.value: You are now Defense 3+ during the first turn of the Fight.

Pass Through.value: You may now roll 2 dice for Escape tests and choose which roll to use. +1 Agility.

651350a6-d930-4372-9bce-1d200149362a.Savage Attack: Use 1 Grit to gain +2 Combat until the end of your turn (Limit once per turn).

Shadow Strike.value: Once per Adventure, transfer 2D6 Wounds from yourself to an adjacent Enemy, ignoring Defense.

Spirit.value: +1 Spirit.  Also gain +2 Health and +2 Sanity

Strength.value: +1 Strength. Also gain 2 Health and +2 Sanity.

651350a6-d930-4372-9bce-1d200149362a.This Way: Once per turn, use 1 Grit to discard and re-draw a Map card just drawn.
651350a6-d930-4372-9bce-1d200149362a.Tracker: Once per Adventure, you may discard and Re-draw an Exploration Token or Encounter card just revealed.

Vendetta.value: Choose an Enemy Type. From now on, any time you collect XP from those Enemies, collect an extra +10 XP

Vengeful Spirits.value: Once per Fight, use 2 Grit to do one automatic Hit to ever Enemy on your Map Tile. Heal 1 Sanity Damage for each Hit done.

651350a6-d930-4372-9bce-1d200149362a.Voices of the Ancestors: You may take 4 Sanity Damage, ignoring Willpower to Recover a Grit

Warrior's Spirit.value: You may now Activate before Enemies at your Initiative level. +1 Spirit.

Anatomy.value: You get Critical Hits on To Hit rolls of 5+ against Enemy Types you have encountered before. +1 Lore.

Antidote.value: Use 1 Grit to let every Hero on your Map Tile choose: Discard all Poison Markers or Discard 1 Corruption Point on D6 roll of 4+. +1 Lore.

6bc4fc3a-4af5-4cf9-b6ad-8615501aca26.Battlefield Experience: You may move through other models during your movement and you automatically pass all Escape tests. At the start of every Fight, Recover 1 Grit

Careful Study.value: You are +1 on Defense rolls against HIts from your Enemy Types you have encountered before. +1 Agility.

Chemistry.value: Use 1 Grit and discard any 2 different Side Bag Tokens to create a dynamite token. +1 Max Grit.

Dark Stone Resistance.value: You can now hold 2 more Corruption Points before gaining a Mutation.

Dispassionate.value: You are immune to the Enemy abilities Fear and Terror. +1 Combat.

6bc4fc3a-4af5-4cf9-b6ad-8615501aca26.Dissection: Once per turn, when you kill an Enemy with a Combat Hit, Recover a Grit on the D6 roll of 4+. +3 Sanity.

Do No Harm.value: There is no longer a penalty for a 1 result when using Field Surgery. +1 Luck.

Doc's Speciality.value: Choose another Hero class. From now on, any time you Heal Wounds from a Hero of that Class, Heal an extra +1 Wound and +1 Sanity Damage from them.

6bc4fc3a-4af5-4cf9-b6ad-8615501aca26.Expert Surgeon: When using your Field Surgery ability, the Injury/Mutation is Healed on the D6 roll of 4+ now. Extra Starting Gear: Surgeon's Saw.

Explorer.value: While in an Other World, you roll 1 extr die on all Skill tests and, at the start of your Acctivation each turn, you Recover a Grit on the D6 roll of 4+. +1 Max Grit.

Explorer's Notes.value: Choose an Other World. From now on, any time you collect XP in that world, collect an extra +5 XP.

6bc4fc3a-4af5-4cf9-b6ad-8615501aca26.Field Research: The first time you encounter a new specific Enemy Type, gain 50 XP (variations count as a new type). Your Attacks are +1 Damage against all Enemy Types you have ever encountered in previous Fights. Extra Starting Gear: Collection Jar.
6bc4fc3a-4af5-4cf9-b6ad-8615501aca26.Field Surgery: Once per Adventure or Town Stay, use 1 Grit to choose an Injury or Mutation on another Hero and roll a D6. On 5+, that Injury/Mutation is Healed (gain 50 XP). On 1, the Hero loses 1 Health Permanently instead. May not be used during a Fight.

Gadgeteer.value: Once per Fight, you may add a number of Damage to one of your Hits equal to the number of Tech Items you currently carry (max +10). +1 Cunning.

Heal Thy Self.value: You automatically Heal 2 Wounds at the start of every turn. You may also use Field Surgery on yourself now. +1 Strength.

6bc4fc3a-4af5-4cf9-b6ad-8615501aca26.Ingenuity: Once per turn, when you use the effect of a Side Bag Token, you may use 1 Grit to roll a D6. On the roll of 4+, do not discard the Side Bag Token.
6bc4fc3a-4af5-4cf9-b6ad-8615501aca26.Medical Training: When using Bandages Tokens to Heal yourself or another Hero, add +3 to the roll (or +5 at Hero Level 5 or higher)

Side Bag Capacity.value: +1 Side Bag Token Capacity. Also gain +D8 Health.

Tinkerer.value: Use 2 Grit to add the following UPgrade to an Item you are carrying: Gadget (1 Upgrade Slot). The Item gains the Keyword Tech and grants +1 Health (or +1 Damage if a Hand Weapon or Gun).

Treatment.value: You now gain 10 XP for each Wound Healed from another Hero. Also once per turn, you may remove 1 status effect marker from yourself or an adjacent Hero.

Triage.value: Whenever you Heal Wounds from another Hero, Reocver a Grit on the D6 roll of 4+. +1 Max Grit.

All Mine!.value: While carrying 4 or more weight worth of Items, you are Defense 3+.

6d198a74-1b2a-4f60-bf51-2c1e2d0ec2e1.Blast Miner: Start every Adventure with 1 free Dynamite Token in your sidebag. You also gain: Free Attack (once per Fight) - Throw Dynamite

Crazed.value: While at half or less Sanity, your Attacks are +1 Damage. +1 Max Grit.

6d198a74-1b2a-4f60-bf51-2c1e2d0ec2e1.Crotchety: May not use Guns or Tech items

Dark Stone Life.value: Your Attacks are +1 Damage for every Mutation you have (max +3). +1 Max Grit.

Dark Stone Resistance.value: You can now hold 2 more Corruption Points before gaining a Mutation.

6d198a74-1b2a-4f60-bf51-2c1e2d0ec2e1.Death Blow: The Hero's To Hit rolls of 8+ double the Damage rolled for that Hit. Only usable with weapons that use D8 for To Hit rolls
6d198a74-1b2a-4f60-bf51-2c1e2d0ec2e1.Eagle Eye: You may Scavenge a Map Tile even if it already has a Scavenged marker on it (Limit one extra Scavenge per Map Tile). Roll one extra die when Scavenging.

Every Rock.value: You may now Scavenge End Caps as though they were full Map Tiles (not including Gates). +1 Move.

6d198a74-1b2a-4f60-bf51-2c1e2d0ec2e1.Expert Miner: Whenever the Hero collects Gold or Dark Stone from Loot, Scavenge, or Encounter cards, double the amount collected.

Gold Fever.value: During an Adventure, once per turn, when collecting Gold, you may Recover 1 Grit.

Good Find!.value: After any Hero in the Posse collects Gold from a Loot or Scavenge card, they may collect an extra $25. +1 Max Grit.

Greedy.value: When drawing Loot cards, you may spend 1 Grit to discard and Re-draw any number of them. +1 Max Grit.

6d198a74-1b2a-4f60-bf51-2c1e2d0ec2e1.Impressive Facial Hair: Once per adventure, you may tug at your facial hair to Recover Grit up to your Max Grit

It's Mine!.value: You gain the Keyword Outlaw and may now use Shotgun Ranged Weapons. +1 Initiative.

Lucky Bugger.value: When using your Expert Miner ability, you may make a Luck 6+ test. If passed, Triple the amount collected. +1 Luck

Master Scavenger.value: After Scavenging, you may spend 1 Grit to set aside a Scavenge card drawn. That card is removed from the deck until the end of the Adventure (Limit 4 cards).

Miner's Vendetta.value: Choose an Enemy Keyword. From now on, any time you collect XP from those Enemies, collect an extra +10 XP

Mining Guide.value: Once per turn, while holding the Lantern, you may spend 1 Grit to Re-roll one of the dice for the Hold Back the Darkness roll.

Side Bag Capacity.value: +2 Side Bag Token Capacity. Also gain +D6 Health

6d198a74-1b2a-4f60-bf51-2c1e2d0ec2e1.Speed of Greed: Once per turn, use 1 Grit to double your Initiative and Move, as well as allowing you to automatically pass all Escape tests. Also your Combat Hits are +1 Damage until the end of that turn.

Squint Eye.value: Once per turn after drawing a Gear or Artifact card, you may discard it and Re-draw. +1 Max Grit.

Staking Claims.value: Once per Adventure, you may cancel and Re-draw an Exploration Token. When selling Gear or Artifact cards in Town, gain an extra D6 x $50

Strength and Luck.value: +1 Strength and +1 Luck. Also gain D6 Sanity.

Wheeler Dealer.value: You may buy Side Bag Tokens in town for half price (round up to nearest $5). +1 Initiative.

Agility.value: +1 Agility. Also gain D6 Health/Sanity (any mix).

Battle Plan.value: Any time you roll a 1 for Move, all Heroes on your Map Tile may Recover 1 Grit. Gain 15 XP for each Grit Recovered.

Cold Stare.value: You may now Activate before Enemies at your Initiative Level. +1 Max Grit.

Cool Head.value: When using Laying Down the Law, you may re-roll any number of To Hit rolls.

Dark Stone Resistance.value: You can now hold 2 more Corruption Points before gaining a Mutation.

Fair Warning.value: You do +2 Damage on any Hits to an Enemy with a higher Initiative. +1 Max Grit.

7309fd50-b111-4d16-8a89-c500807b3472.Frontier Justice: Use 1 Grit to add +3 Damage to one of your Hits (limit once per Hit).
7309fd50-b111-4d16-8a89-c500807b3472.Iron Will: Use 1 Grit to cancel a Darkness card on the D6 roll of 4, 5, or 6 (limit once per turn).

Judge, Jury, and Executioner.value: Use 1 Grit to make all of your Attacks get Critical Hits on rolls of 5 or 6 until the end of your turn.

7309fd50-b111-4d16-8a89-c500807b3472.Laying Down the Law: Once per Attack, you may Re-roll one To Hit roll.

Learning to Live With It.value: Any time you kill an Enemy, Heal 2 Sanity Damage.

Long Arm of the Law.value: +1 Combat and +1 Strength and +1 Max Grit.

7309fd50-b111-4d16-8a89-c500807b3472.Man of Action: You may roll 2 dice for Move each turn and choose which to use.
7309fd50-b111-4d16-8a89-c500807b3472.Motivate: Use 1 Grit to give all other Heroes +1 Initiative and +1 Move until the end of the turn. Gain 30 XP.

Never Gives Up.value: While KO'd, at the start of each turn, roll a D6. On the roll of 5 or 6, Heal D6 Wounds/Sanity (any mix) and place your model back on the board.

Reassure.value: Once per turn, use 1 Grit to prevent D6 Wounds or Sanity Damage that another Hero would take. Gain 10 XP

Side Bag Capacity.value: +1 Side Bag Token Capacity. Also gain +D6 Health/Sanity (any mix).

Standing Your Ground.value: At the start of a turn, you may reduce your Initiative to 1. If you do, you are Defense 3+ this turn.

Strength.value: +1 Strength. Also gain D6 Health/Sanity (any mix).

7309fd50-b111-4d16-8a89-c500807b3472.Strong Leadership: Use 1 Grit to Heal 1 Health and 1 Sanity from yourself and every other Hero on your Map Tile - Gain 5 XP for every Wound/Sanity healed from another Hero this way.

Teamwork.value: Use 2 Grit to add your Skill value to another Hero's Skill for a single test. If the test is successful, gain 25 XP.

Temper.value: Once per turn, use 2 Grit to add +1P Damage to one of your Hits or +2P Damage if you are at less than half Health.

Vendetta.value: Choose an Enemy Type. From now on, any time you collect XP from those Enemies, collect an extra +10 XP

All In.value: Choose one of the Starting Upgrades of your Secondary Hero Class to acquire. This includes any Gear that goes with it.

Bloodlust.value: Once per turn, when you kill an Enemy, you may Heal D6 Wounds. +5 Health.

Dark Stone Resistance.value: You can now hold 2 more Corruption Points before gaining a Mutation.

Dodge.value: Once per turn, use 1 Grit to ignore a single Enemy Hit against you (before you roll for Defense).

Grown Up Fast.value: When rolling for Discovery on your Orphan Mission, you may roll 1 extra die, then choose one die to discard. +1 Max Grit.

Hardened by the World.value: You are now +1 Damage on your To Hit rolls of 6+.

Hide.value: Once per Fight, if there are no Enemies adjacent to you, you may Recover 1 Grit.

I Can Handle It Myself!.value: Once per turn, use 1 Grit to force any single die to be Re-rolled, even if it has already been Re-rolled.

I'm Not a Kid.value: Once per turn, you may take D3 Corruption Hits to Recover a Grit. May also be used once per Town Stay. +1 Max Grit.

Lash Out.value: Use 2 Grit to add 1P Damage to one of your Hits. +1 Strength.

7c791b38-c539-4964-890c-db925782933a.Need for Vengeance: Start each Adventure with a Revive Token only usable by your Hero

Over Your Head.value: While there ar eno other Heroes on your Map Tile, you are Defense 3+. +1 Max Grit.

7c791b38-c539-4964-890c-db925782933a.Quick: Always Activates before Enemies at Initiative level and automatically passes all Escape tests
7c791b38-c539-4964-890c-db925782933a.Rage: Once per Fight, use 1 Grit to gain: A) +1 Combat and all of your Combat Hits are +1 Damage for one Attack or B) +1 Shot with a Gun for one Attack.
7c791b38-c539-4964-890c-db925782933a.Running Ahead: Gain 5 XP x your Hero Level any time you Look Through a Doorway. +2 Move.

Side Bag Capacity.value: +1 Side Bag Token Capacity. Also gain +D6 Sanity (any mix).

7c791b38-c539-4964-890c-db925782933a.Small Target: Once per turn, you may Re-roll a single Defense roll.

Sneak Attack.value: While there is only one Enemy adjacent to you, your attacks are +2 Damage against that Enemy. +1 Cunning.

Something to Prove.value: Any time you kill and Enemy, gain +10 XP (or +50 XP if Large or bigger). +3 Health.

Sprint.value: You may now roll the D8 for Move each turn and Recover a Grit on the roll of 1 or 8.

Toe-to-Toe.value: While adjacent to a Large or bigger Enemy, your attacks are +1 Damage to that Enemy (or +2 on a Critical Hit). +1 Max Grit.

7c791b38-c539-4964-890c-db925782933a.Wiley: Armor 6+. You may move through other models during your movement.
7c791b38-c539-4964-890c-db925782933a.Young: May not Dual Wield Guns. Unless KO'd, may Heal 1 Wound or 1 Sanity Damage at the start of each turn

7fa50e95-f33d-43a8-b93b-501a7b3f3a3a.Acrobatic Dodge: You may move through other models during your movement. Once per turn you may Re-roll one failed Defense roll.

Agility.value: +1 Agility. Also gain D6 Health/Sanity (any mix).

7fa50e95-f33d-43a8-b93b-501a7b3f3a3a.Comforting Presence: At the end of Hero Turn, you may Heal 1 Wound or 1 Sanity from every other adjacent Hero (gain 5 XP for each Healed this way)

Dark Stone Resistance.value: You can now hold 2 more Corruption Points before gaining a Mutation.

7fa50e95-f33d-43a8-b93b-501a7b3f3a3a.Dirty Fightin': All of your Attacks are +1 Damage

Fast as Lightning.value: Free Attack: Once per Fight, use during your Move. Do 1 Hit each to up to 3 Enemies adjacent to you.

7fa50e95-f33d-43a8-b93b-501a7b3f3a3a.Gentle Manner: You now gain an extra +5 XP per Wound/Sanity that you Heal from another Hero. +3 Sanity.

Hidden Pouch.value: You may carry up to 3 extra Side Bag Tokens. +1 Cunning.

Hit 'Em Where It Hurts.value: Use 1 Grit to ignore an Enemy's Defense for one of your Hits. No effect on Tough Enemies. +1 Max Grit.

I Can Take Care of Myself!.value: Once per Adventure, prevent all Damage you would take from a single source. +1 Lore.

7fa50e95-f33d-43a8-b93b-501a7b3f3a3a.Knockout Punch: Use 1 Grit to double the amount just rolled on one of your Damage rolls (Limit once per Hit).
7fa50e95-f33d-43a8-b93b-501a7b3f3a3a.Lightweight: May only use Guns that have the keyword Light

Never a Dull Moment.value: Any time you roll a No Event result on a Town Location Chart, gain 25 XP and D6 x $10. +1 Lore.

Parry.value: Any time an adjacent Enemy rolls a 1 To Hit you, do 1 Wound to it, ignoring Defense.

Rapid Strike.requires: I Can Take Care of Myself!
Rapid Strike.value: Any time you kill an Enemy with a Combat Hit, you gain +1 Combat for that Attack.

Rough and Tumble.value: You may now use any 1-Handed Gun. +3 Health.

7fa50e95-f33d-43a8-b93b-501a7b3f3a3a.Sleight of Hand: Use 1 Grit to Ready a Once Per Fight Item you are carrying. You may also roll an extra die for Scavenging.

Slip By.value: You automatically succeed at all Escape tests. +1 Agility.

Spinning Kick.value: Use 1 Grit to do 2 Wounds to an adjacent Enemy, ignoring Defense. You may move them up to 2 spaces (unless Large). +1 Strength.

Spunky.value: Any time you kill an Enemy, roll a D6. On the roll of 5 or 6, Recover 1 Grit. +1 Max Grit.

Strength.value: +1 Strength. Also gain D6 Health/Sanity (any mix).

Witty Retort.value: Once per turn when you kill an Enemy you may Heal 2 Wounds. +1 Max Grit.

c2c8ed0b-4104-44a2-9bfc-b403a7b70615.Barrage: Once per turn, use 1 Grit to gain +1 Shot with each 1-Handed Gun you fire this turn.

Charge.value: At the start of your Activation, you may choose an Enemy that is not adjacent. You are +2 Damage on all Combat Hits to that Enemy this turn.

Chew on This!.value: Once per Fight, when you get a Critical Hit on a Melee Attack, you may discard a Dynamite Token to add 2D6 Damage to the Hit.

Cunning Plan.value: When holding up the Outpost Bank in Town, you now steal +$50 for every 5+ rolled.

Dark Stone Dynamite.value: Once per turn, Use 1 Dark Stone when Throwing a Dynamite Token to add +2 Damage to each model Hit.

Deadly.value: Your Melee Attacks get Critical Hits on rolls of 5 or 6 now.

Destruction Artist.value: Any Explosives you Throw Bounce 1 fewer times than whatever is rolled

c2c8ed0b-4104-44a2-9bfc-b403a7b70615.Explosives Expert: Use 2 Grit to gain a Dynamite Token. Extra Starting Gear: Dynamite Satchel and 2 Dynamite Tokens

Infamy.value: Once per Town Stay, you may intimidate a local shopkeeper to pay D6 x $25 less for a single Item/Service

Lovable Scoundrel.value: You gain double the XP listed on all Loot and Scavenge cards. +1 Spirit.

Rage.value: Once per turn, use 3 Grit to gain +4 Combat for one Attack. +1 Max Grit.

Sinister Laugh.value: Any time you kill an Enemy, roll a D6. On the roll of 5 or 6, Recover 1 Grit. +1 Max Grit.

Steel Nerves.value: Once per turn, you may Re-roll a single failed Willpower save. +1 Max Grit.

Strength.value: +1 Strength. Also gain D6 Health/Sanity (any mix).

Strong Arm.value: You may double your Range for Throwing Explosives. +1 Strength.

Swindler.value: Anytime you draw a Loot card, you may discard it and draw a new one. You must keep the second card drawn. You are also +1 Combat.

c2c8ed0b-4104-44a2-9bfc-b403a7b70615.Swingin' Fists: Instead of a normal Melee Attack, use 1 Grit to do a 3 Combat Melee Attack to every adjacent Model.
c2c8ed0b-4104-44a2-9bfc-b403a7b70615.Twin Guns: You may fire two 1-Handed Guns per turn with no penalty for the off-hand Gun. Extra Starting Gear: Pistol

Twitch.value: Once per Adventure, gain +4 Initiative until the end of the turn. +1 Max Grit.

Vendetta.value: Choose an Enemy Type. From now on, any time you collect XP from those Enemies, collect an extra +10 XP

c2c8ed0b-4104-44a2-9bfc-b403a7b70615.Wild Card: You may Recover a Grit on a Move roll of 1 or 2

Won't Stay Dead.value: At the start of each turn, Heal 1 Wound on the D6 roll of 4+. If KO'd, instead you may Recover on the D6 roll of 4+ (you must still roll for Injury/Madness)

Agility.value: +1 Agility. Also gain D6 Health/Sanity (any mix).

Ancient Writing.value: +1 Faith while in an Other World. +1 Max Grit.

Chosen.value: Once per turn, you may Re-roll a single Defense roll

fa565014-f32b-46b4-9621-f2936d079b35.Crush the Forsaken (Demon): From now on, any time you collect XP from that kind of Enemy, collect an extra +5 XP.
fa565014-f32b-46b4-9621-f2936d079b35.Crush the Forsaken (Undead): From now on, any time you collect XP from that kind of Enemy, collect an extra +5 XP.
fa565014-f32b-46b4-9621-f2936d079b35.Crush the Forsaken (Void): From now on, any time you collect XP from that kind of Enemy, collect an extra +5 XP.
fa565014-f32b-46b4-9621-f2936d079b35.Firebrand: Once per turn, when Performing a Judgement Sermon, you may Re-roll one of the Casting Dice.

Forbidden Knowledge.value: New Sermon.  You may now hold 5 more Corruption Points before getting a Mutation.

Frothing Rage.value: Whenever you kill an adjacent Enemy, before assigning any more Hits, you may Move up to 2 spaces in any direction ignoring Escape tests.

fa565014-f32b-46b4-9621-f2936d079b35.Holy Man: You may not use Guns. Starts with 1 Blessing and 1 Judgement.

Holy Revolution.value: Anytime you kill a Demon, every Hero on your Map Tile may Heal 1 Wound or Sanity Damage

Holy Strike.value: Once per turn, you may Re-roll one of your To Hit rolls.

Keep the Faith.value: You may choose one Injury/Mutation/Madness to Heal.  If you have none, gain +1 Faith.

Martyr.value: Once per turn, you may take 1 Corruption Point, ignoring Willpower, to Heal D6 Health/Sanity (any mix) from yourself or another Hero on your Map Tile. +1 Max Grit.

fa565014-f32b-46b4-9621-f2936d079b35.Missionary: Once per turn, when Performing a Blessing Sermon, you may Re-roll one of the Casting Dice.
fa565014-f32b-46b4-9621-f2936d079b35.Redemptionist: You may now use 2-Handed Guns. Extra Starting Gear: Shotgun (replaces Holy Book)

Salvation.value: Use 2 Grit to remove a Corruption Point from yourself.

fa565014-f32b-46b4-9621-f2936d079b35.Scourge of the Dead: You are +1 Damage on all Attacks against Undead Enemies

Side Bag Capacity.value: +1 Side Bag Token Capacity. Also gain +D6 Health/Sanity (any mix).

Stories of the Void.value: All of your Attacks are +1 Damage against Void Enemies. +1 Lore.

Strength.value: +1 Strength. Also gain D6 Health/Sanity (any mix).

Tools of the Damned.value: All of your Attacks are +1 Damage against Demon Enemies. +1 Lore.

Zealot.value: Once per turn, you may take 3 Wounds, ignoring Defense, to add +D6 Damage to one your Hits. +1 Max Grit.
